Hey <@U69F2VCFJ>, I am looking for some wayout to replicate the following behaviour with Transformers.jl:

```output, new_past = model(embeddings, past=past) # model -> gpt2 LMhead model
```
Can you suggest how this can be done? I was trying to do it with Transformers.HuggingFace gpt2 model, but was facing some errors.
